translated: Blessed One, it is because diminution is not one thing🔽and the applications of mindfulness another.

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: It is not many things

analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te / de'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i 'grib gang lags pa de /
translated: and not different things.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, Blessed One, the diminution of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags te /
translated: The decrease of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and eightfold noble path is not the eightfold noble path.

original: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'grib @498b pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'grib @498b pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
translated: Thus, the eightfold noble path and its decrease are not a duality.

original: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: They are not divided.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: it is because the decrease is not one,

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: not two,

original: mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: not many, and not separate.

original: de'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, the decrease of the eightfold noble path is not the eightfold noble path.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the aspects of liberation, the aspects of the gateways of liberation, the emptiness gateway to liberation, the signlessness gateway to liberation, the wishlessness gateway to liberation, the aspects of the gateways of meditative stability, the aspects of the gateways of mnemonic control, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of fearlessness, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, and the aspects of the gateways of the distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽“Lord, the perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving, and in the same vein, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang; so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma lags te /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang; so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma lags te /
translated: “Lord, the emptiness of emptiness is empty of the emptiness of emptiness, and in the same vein, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of essential nature are empty of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /🔽gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te / gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: “Lord, the applications of mindfulness are empty of the applications of mindfulness, and in the same vein, the aspects of the correct exertions, the aspects of the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the aspects of the path are empty of the aspects of the path.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord, the ten powers of the tathāgatas are empty of the ten powers of the tathāgatas, and in the same vein, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are empty of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: It is like this: decrease is not one,

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: not two,

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: not many,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /🔽de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @499a *//
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te / de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @499a *//
translated: and not separate.

original: ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so //
analyzed: ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, Blessed One, the decrease of the unshared qualities of a buddha is not the unshared qualities of a buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
translated: in the same way, the decrease of suchness, unmistaken suchness, unaltered suchness, the very essence of phenomena, the expanse of reality, the establishment of phenomena, the fixed sequence of Dharma, the very limit of reality,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings nas /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings nas /
translated: the inconceivable expanse,

analyzed: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: nor are they divided.

analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: it is because its diminution is not one,

analyzed: gnyis ma lags /

translated: not many,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /

translated: and not separate.

analyzed: de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so //
translated: is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /

analyzed: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //

analyzed: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //

analyzed: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //

translated: “The so-called eye contact is not two and

original: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //

translated: “The so-called ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, and mind contact are not two and

original: nyams pa ma mchis @500a *//
analyzed: nyams pa ma mchis @500a *//
translated: are not diminished.

original: pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
analyzed: pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
translated: is a designation for the non-dual Dharma.

original: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: “The condition of contact at the eye” is a designation for the non-dual Dharma.🔽“The condition of contact at the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind” is a designation for the non-dual Dharma.🔽“The feeling that arises from the condition of contact at the eye” is a designation for the non-dual Dharma.

original: gang yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /🔽nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: “The feeling that arises from the condition of contact at the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind” is a designation for the non-dual Dharma.

original: gang yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
analyzed: gang yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
translated: “The applications of mindfulness” is a designation for the non-dual Dharma.

original: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
analyzed: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
translated: is a nondual Dharma discourse that is not broken down.

original: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
analyzed: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
translated: Up to the noble eightfold path is a nondual Dharma discourse that is not broken down.

original: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
analyzed: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are a nondual Dharma discourse that is not broken down.

original: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: nyams pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is a nondual Dharma discourse that is not broken down.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag @500b nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bcu gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag @500b nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bcu gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This was the twelfth chapter on “The Perfection of Wisdom” in “The Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: He said this to the venerable Subhūti:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar yongs su rtog /
analyzed: chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar yongs su rtog /
translated: how do they thoroughly investigate these dharmas?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni gang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni gang /
translated: what is a bodhisattva?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
translated: What is the perfection of wisdom?

original: yongs su brtag pa ni gang /
analyzed: yongs su brtag pa ni gang /
translated: What is thorough investigation?”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When this was said, the venerable Subhūti said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra:

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni /
translated: regarding what you said, ‘What is a bodhisattva?’

original: gang gi phyir sems can byang chub yin pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sems can byang chub yin pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: Because beings are awakening, therefore they are called ‘bodhisattvas.’

original: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: “By means of that enlightenment, they know the aspects of all phenomena,

original: chos de dag la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos de dag la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: but they do not settle down on those phenomena.

original: chos gang gi rnam pa shes she na /
analyzed: chos gang gi rnam pa shes she na /
translated: What are the aspects of those phenomena that they know?

original: gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: They know the aspects of form,

original: de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: but they do not settle down on it.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te /
translated: They know the aspects of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness,

original: de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: but they do not settle down on them.🔽They know the aspects of the sense fields, elements, and dependent origination,

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam pa shes te; de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam pa shes te; de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: but they do not settle down on them.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te /🔽de la mngon par @501a *//
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te / de la mngon par @501a *//
translated: They know the aspects of the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: chags pa med do //
analyzed: chags pa med do //
translated: but they do not settle down on them.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes pa /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes pa /
translated: wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not settle down on them.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin /🔽rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: what are the aspects of all dharmas?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāriputra,🔽all dharmas are empty of the essential nature of all dharmas.

original: rnam pa gang dang; tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams rnam pa yod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gang dang; tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams rnam pa yod par bya ba ste /
translated: What are the aspects, what are the modes, and what are the signs by which phenomena are to be made to have aspects?

original: 'di ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gzugs sam /🔽sgra'am / dri 'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gzugs sam / sgra'am / dri 'am /
translated: Thus, conditioned and unconditioned phenomena are form,🔽sound,🔽smell,🔽taste,

original: ro 'am / reg gam /🔽phyi nang gi chos kyang shes te /
analyzed: ro 'am / reg gam / phyi nang gi chos kyang shes te /
translated: or touch,🔽or internal and external phenomena.

original: rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis rnam pa yod par bya ba 'di dag ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis rnam pa yod par bya ba 'di dag ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: These are called the aspects of all phenomena.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du /
translated: you asked

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhes zer ba ni /
translated: ‘What is the perfection of wisdom?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du @501b song ba ste /
analyzed: gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du @501b song ba ste /
translated: that which is called the perfection of wisdom has gone far,

original: gang las ring du song ba zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang las ring du song ba zhes bya zhe na /
translated: and from what has it gone far?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽it has gone far from form,

original: phung po rnams las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: phung po rnams las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is far removed from the aggregates.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called “far removed.”

original: skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is far removed from the sense bases and elements.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called “far removed.”

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba drug las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba drug las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is far removed from all the afflictions, all the views, and the six destinies.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called “far removed.”

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is far removed from the perfection of generosity.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called “far removed.”

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is far removed from the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called “far removed.”

original: nang stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is far removed from inner and outer emptiness,🔽and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of emptiness,🔽and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of great extent,🔽and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: and for that reason it is called “far removed.”

original: phyi stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is far removed from the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽and for that reason it is called “far removed.”

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is far removed from the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽and for that reason it is called “far removed.”

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is far removed from the emptiness of all things,

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽and for that reason it is called “far removed.”🔽It is far removed from the emptiness of the absence of an existent thing,

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

original: ci'i phyir na /

analyzed: de skad du skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
translated: In the same way, it is said that the sense spheres, elements, dependent origination, perfections, all emptinesses, all dharmas of the āryas, and the four truths🔽are not two nor divided, not cut off nor eternal, not increased nor decreased, not come nor gone, and not defiled nor purified.

original: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The concentrations, immeasurables, formless absorptions, liberations, serial absorptions, emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / @509b ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /

translated: signlessness, wishlessness, clairvoyances, meditative stabilizations, dhāraṇī gateways, powers of the tathāgatas, fearlessnesses, individual correct knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer /
translated: The nonproduction of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha and the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.”

translated: the decrease of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness,

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
translated: the decrease of the constituents, the sense fields, dependent origination, the perfections, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /🔽mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma @512a *//🔽yin; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma @512a *// yin; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the higher cognitions, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha are not distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer /
translated: Up to and the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: In this way, whatever is the decrease, and whatever is form, and whatever is the absence of duality, and whatever is the decrease, and whatever is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness,

original: gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: and whatever is the absence of duality, all those dharmas are neither conjoined nor disjoined;

original: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: they are not manifest; they do not have an object; they are not immaterial; they are not mentally cognizable.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: They are all of one mark—that is, they are markless.

original: 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched dang; khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched dang; khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Whatever is the decrease, and whatever is the sense spheres, and whatever is the elements, and whatever is dependent origination, and whatever is the absence of duality, all those dharmas are neither conjoined nor disjoined;

original: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: they are not manifest; they do not have an object; they are not immaterial; they are not mentally cognizable.🔽They are all of one mark—that is, they are markless.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: Thus, they are the same in being without defining characteristics.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not diminished, and the perfection of concentration is not diminished.🔽The perfection of perseverance is not diminished, and the perfection of patience is not diminished.🔽The perfection of morality is not diminished, and the perfection of giving is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena is not diminished, and the emptiness of external phenomena is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is not diminished, and the emptiness of emptiness is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of great extent is not diminished, and the emptiness of ultimate reality is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not diminished, and the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of the unlimited is not diminished, and the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of non-dispersal is not diminished, and the emptiness of inherent existence is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of all things is not diminished, and the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is not diminished, and the emptiness of non-dispersal is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is not diminished, and the emptiness of all things is not diminished.🔽The emptiness of specific characteristics is not diminished, and the emptiness of the nature of non-entities is not diminished.

original: 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang; stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs @512b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
analyzed: 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang; stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs @512b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not diminished, and the right efforts are not diminished.🔽The legs of miraculous power are not diminished, and the faculties are not diminished.🔽The powers are not diminished, and the branches of enlightenment are not diminished.🔽The path is not diminished, and the aspects of the path are not diminished.🔽The concentrations are not diminished, and the immeasurables are not diminished.🔽The formless absorptions are not diminished, and the liberations are not diminished.🔽The modes of conduct are not diminished, and the totalities are not diminished.🔽The aspects of extrasensory knowledge are not diminished, and the meditative absorption is not diminished.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
translated: The meditative stabilities are not diminished, and the dhāraṇī gateways are not diminished.🔽The ten powers of the tathāgatas are not diminished, and the four fearlessnesses are not diminished.🔽The four kinds of detailed and thorough knowledge are not diminished, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are not diminished.🔽The thirty-two major marks of a great being are not diminished,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang /🔽gnyis su byar med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, the distinct attributes of a buddha, up to and the knowledge of all aspects,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: and the phenomena that are not to be divided into two—all of them are not conjoined and not disjoined;

original: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: they are formless, invisible, and non-reactive;

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: they are all of one single mark, which is no mark.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: through this one of many explanations

original: gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin /
translated: the extinction of form is not form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin /
translated: and the extinction of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin /
translated: the same applies to the diminution of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med @513a *//
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med @513a *//
translated: It is the same for the perfections, all the emptinesses, the dharmas on the side of awakening, the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables,

original: pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang; rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang; rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: smras pa / rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: why is it so?

original: de skad du gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: de skad du gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, it is because that which is called ‘form’ is made into an unpaired number.

original: gang 'di tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: That which is called ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness’ is made into an unpaired number.

original: gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: This is the way of enumerating non-duality up to the knowledge of all modes.

original: zhes zer / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: zhes zer / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhuti :

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Venerable Sariputra,

original: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs /
translated: form is not one thing, nonproduction another,

original: gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: nonproduction is form, form is nonproduction.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Sariputra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for this reason

original: gang 'di @513b gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di @513b gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: this is the way of enumerating non-duality, that 'form' is not one thing, 'nonproduction' another.

original: 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin /🔽ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te; ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin / ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te; ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa /
translated: Feeling, perception, impulse, consciousness is not one thing, nonproduction another;

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste /
translated: nonproduction is consciousness, consciousness is nonproduction.🔽Venerable Sariputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: for this reason🔽this is the way of enumerating non-duality, that 'consciousness' is not one thing, 'nonproduction' another.

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: For this reason,

original: gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: this is reckoned as a non-dual number.

original: 'di ltar skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
translated: In the same way, the sense-spheres, the elements, dependent origination, the perfections, all the emptinesses, the factors of awakening, the noble truths, the meditative concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /🔽ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin / ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of non-observation, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of other things, the emptiness of the essential nature of other things, the emptiness of the ultimate, the emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded,🔽the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽and the perfection of wisdom are not one thing and non-arising another.🔽Non-arising itself is the perfection of wisdom.🔽

analyzed: ma skyes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid /
translated: Nor is the unborn anything other than that.🔽The unborn itself is the knowledge of all aspects.
