original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: by this one of many explanations

original: gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: this so-called knowledge of all aspects is made into an enumeration of nonduality.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gang gi tshe na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gang gi tshe na /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe /
translated: and investigate those dharmas in that way,

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: they see the non-arising of form because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: They see the non-arising of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, owing to their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du skye mched rnams dang; khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du skye mched rnams dang; khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: They see the non-arising of the sense fields, the elements, and dependent origination, owing to their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong @514b bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong @514b bar 'gyur /
translated: They see the non-arising of the perfection of giving, owing to its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: They see the non-arising of the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom, owing to their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du nang stong nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du nang stong nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the non-arising of the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the non-arising of the other aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the non-arising of the applications of mindfulness.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang; 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang; 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: “Because of being utterly pure, they see the non-arising of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, branches of awakening, and path.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i @515a *//
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i @515a *//
translated: “They will see the non-arising of the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the gateways of meditative stability, the gateways of meditative absorption,

original: stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: the emptiness gateway to liberation, the signlessness gateway to liberation, the wishlessness gateway to liberation, the higher perceptions, the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: “Because of profound purity, they will see the non-arising of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du /
translated: “Because of profound purity,

original: so so'i skye bo'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: they will see the non-arising of ordinary people.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa dang; rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar gyur /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa dang; rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar gyur /
translated: “Because of profound purity, they will see the non-arising of the dharmas of ordinary people.🔽“Because of profound purity, they will see the non-arising of stream enterers and the dharmas of stream enterers,

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang /
translated: “Because of profound purity, they will see the non-arising of once-returners and the dharmas of once-returners, of non-returners and the dharmas of non-returners, of arhats and the dharmas of arhats,

original: rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: the pratyekabuddhas and the pratyekabuddha-dharmas, the bodhisattvas and the bodhisattva-dharmas, and the Buddhas and the Buddha-dharmas.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of their utter purity, the non-production of the Buddha-dharmas is seen.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said to the venerable Subhūti:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i @515b don bdag gis shes pa ltar na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i @515b don bdag gis shes pa ltar na /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, as I understand the meaning of what you have said,

original: gzugs kyang ma skyes la /
analyzed: gzugs kyang ma skyes la /
translated: form is also unproduced,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes /
translated: and feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are also unproduced.🔽The sense domains are also unproduced.

original: skye mched rnams kyang ma skyes /🔽khams rnams kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: skye mched rnams kyang ma skyes / khams rnams kyang ma skyes /
translated: The constituents are also unproduced.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyang ma skyes /
translated: Dependent origination is also unproduced.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang ma skyes /
translated: the perfections are non-arisen;

original: stong pa nyid thams cad kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad kyang ma skyes /
translated: all the emptinesses are non-arisen;

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma skyes /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma skyes /
translated: the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are non-arisen;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes /
translated: the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions are non-arisen;

original: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang ma skyes /
translated: the liberations, the serial absorptions, and the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are doors of liberation are non-arisen;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes /
translated: the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways are non-arisen;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma skyes /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not produced,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ma skyes /
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is not produced,

original: so so'i skye bo'ang ma skyes /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'ang ma skyes /
translated: an ordinary person is not produced,

original: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang ma skyes /
translated: the dharmas of an ordinary person are not produced,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'ang ma skyes /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'ang ma skyes /
translated: a stream enterer is not produced,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes /
translated: the dharmas of a stream enterer are not produced,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'ang ma skyes /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'ang ma skyes /
translated: a once-returner is not produced,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes @516a *//
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes @516a *//
translated: the dharmas of a once-returner are not produced,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'ang ma skyes /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'ang ma skyes /
translated: a non-returner is not produced,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes /
translated: the dharmas of a non-returner are not produced,

original: dgra bcom pa'ang ma skyes /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'ang ma skyes /
translated: a worthy one is not produced,

original: dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang ma skyes /
translated: the dharmas of a worthy one are not produced,🔽a pratyekabuddha is not produced,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes; rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes; rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes /
translated: the dharmas of a pratyekabuddha are not produced,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang ma skyes /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang ma skyes /
translated: the bodhisattva is not produced,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang ma skyes /
translated: the attributes of a bodhisattva are not produced,

original: sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes /
translated: the Buddha is not produced,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa yin na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa yin na /
translated: and the attributes of a Buddha are not produced,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: then, Venerable Subhūti,

original: de ltar gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: de ltar gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med /
translated: if form is not produced,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang skye ba med /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang skye ba med /
translated: up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are not produced,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang skye ba med /🔽so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang skye ba med / so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med /
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is not produced,🔽an ordinary person is not produced,

original: so so'i skye po'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: so so'i skye po'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: the attributes of an ordinary person are not produced,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: a stream enterer and the attributes of a stream enterer are not produced,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: a once-returner and the attributes of a once-returner are not produced,🔽a non-returner and the attributes of a non-returner are not produced,

original: dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: a worthy one and the attributes of a worthy one are not produced,

original: rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: the pratyekabuddhas and the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas are non-arising,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med /
translated: the bodhisattvas are non-arising,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba med /
translated: the dharmas of the bodhisattvas are non-arising,

original: sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med /
translated: the buddhas are non-arising,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med na ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med na ni /
translated: and the dharmas of the buddhas are non-arising,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /
translated: then those who follow the Śrāvaka Vehicle

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra @516b bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra @516b bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /
translated: would have already attained the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, and arhatship.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who follow the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle would have already attained the awakening of a pratyekabuddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the bodhisattva great beings would have already attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha mi dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha mi dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the five kinds of beings would not be distinct.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva would have already attained the five kinds of enlightenment.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na /🔽ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni /
analyzed: gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na / ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni /
translated: if all phenomena are unborn,🔽why does the stream enterer cultivate the path

original: kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
analyzed: kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
translated: in order to abandon the three fetters?🔽Why does the once-returner cultivate the path

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lam bsgoms /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lam bsgoms /
translated: in order to reduce attachment, aversion, and delusion?🔽Why does the non-returner cultivate the path

original: phyir mi 'ong bas ni dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong bas ni dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
translated: in order to abandon the five lower fetters?🔽Why does the arhat cultivate the path

original: dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
analyzed: dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms /
translated: in order to abandon the five higher fetters?

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni /
translated: Why do those who have entered the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas

original: rang byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms /
translated: cultivate the path for the sake of pratyekabuddha enlightenment?

original: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Why do bodhisattva mahāsattvas

original: sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod cing /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod cing /
translated: “For the sake of sentient beings, I will experience such suffering and engage in difficult practices.

original: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
translated: Why has the Tathāgata

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
translated: attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment?

original: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
translated: Why has the Tathāgata

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
translated: turned the wheel of the sacred doctrine?

original: @517a *// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: @517a *// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Thus addressed, the venerable Su­bhūti replied to the venerable Śāradvatī­putra as follows:

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud pa yod par mi 'dod do //🔽ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud pa yod par mi 'dod do // ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,🔽I do not consider that there is attainment or realization in the unborn,🔽I do not consider that there is entry into the stream in the unborn,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not consider that there is the fruit of entry into the stream in the unborn,

original: ma skyes pa la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that one who is unborn is a once-returner.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that the fruit of a once-returner exists.🔽I do not accept that one who is unborn is a non-returner.

original: ma skyes pa la phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa la phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that the fruit of a non-returner exists.

original: ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that one who is unborn is a worthy one.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par mi 'dod do //🔽ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par mi 'dod do // ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that the state of a worthy one exists.🔽I do not accept that one who is unborn is a pratyekabuddha.

original: rang byang chub yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not accept that pratyekabuddhahood exists.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: I do not accept that a bodhisattva great being

original: dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: practices austerities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do //
translated: Bodhisattva great beings do not practice with the notion that they are practicing austerities.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na /
translated: If they were to generate the idea of suffering,

original: sems can tshad mid grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi nus kyi /
analyzed: sems can tshad mid grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi nus kyi /
translated: they would not be able to work for the welfare of countless, limitless sentient beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed @517b ba dang / phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pas /
analyzed: sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed @517b ba dang / phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pas /
translated: by generating the idea of sentient beings as their mother, as their father, as themselves, and as their child,

original: sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don bya ba de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don bya ba de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: they are able to work for the welfare of countless, limitless sentient beings, and that is also done in a way that does not objectify anything.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings generate the following thought:

original: ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba'ang de ni thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos rnams la'ang 'du shes bskyed de /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba'ang de ni thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos rnams la'ang 'du shes bskyed de /
translated: ‘Just as the so-called self is in every way, in every respect, non-existent and non-apprehensible, so too should I generate the idea of inner and outer phenomena.

original: de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes mi bskyed do //
analyzed: de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes mi bskyed do //
translated: Even though I generate that idea, I should not generate the idea of hardship.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar de ni chos gang yang mi len /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni chos gang yang mi len /
translated: In this way, he does not take up any dharma,

original: mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he does not stand in any dharma.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni ma skyes pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni ma skyes pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that the Tathāgata exists in the unborn,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'dod de /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'dod de /
translated: nor do I assert that unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening exists.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na /
translated: As the Tathāgata has turned the wheel of the Dharma,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa'am 'thob par bya ba med do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa'am 'thob par bya ba med do //
translated: there is no attainment or one who attains in the unborn.🔽Śāradvatīputra said,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: khyod chos skyes pas 'thob par 'dod dam /
analyzed: khyod chos skyes pas 'thob par 'dod dam /
translated: do you assert that attainment is by a dharma that has arisen,

original: 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod /
analyzed: 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod /
translated: or do you assert that attainment is by a dharma that has not arisen?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do //
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽I do not assert that attainment is by a dharma that has arisen,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do //
translated: nor do I assert that attainment is by a dharma that has not arisen.”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /🔽'o na 'thob pa med la mngon par rtogs @518a *//
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / 'o na 'thob pa med la mngon par rtogs @518a *//
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: pa med dam /🔽rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: pa med dam / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: is there no attainment and no clear realization?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu 'thob pa yang yod /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu 'thob pa yang yod /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de /
translated: there is attainment and there is clear realization,

original: gnyis kyis ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gnyis kyis ma yin gyi /
translated: but not in terms of duality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'thob pa'am mngon par rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'thob pa'am mngon par rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra, attainment and clear realization are designated by worldly convention.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'am /
translated: Stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am /
translated: once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'am /
translated: non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa'am /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'am /
translated: arhat,

original: rang sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas sam /
translated: pratyekabuddha,

original: byang chub sems dpa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'am /
translated: bodhisattva,

original: sangs rgyas dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste /🔽don dam par ni 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste / don dam par ni 'thob pa'am /
translated: and buddha are designated by worldly convention.

original: mngon par rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'am /
translated: In the ultimate sense, there is no attainment or clear realization,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'am /
translated: no stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am / phyir mi 'ong ba'am /
translated: no once-returner,🔽no non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa'am /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'am /
translated: no arhat,🔽no pratyekabuddha,🔽no bodhisattva,🔽and no buddha.

original: rang sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas sam /
translated: nor a pratyekabuddha,

original: byang chub sems dpa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'am /
translated: nor a bodhisattva,

original: sangs rgyas su gdags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas su gdags pa med do //
translated: nor a buddha.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi /
translated: ” “Venerable Subhūti, just as attainment and clear realization exist as worldly conventions, in the same way, the five kinds of beings are also distinct as worldly conventions,

original: don dam par ma yin nam /
analyzed: don dam par ma yin nam /
translated: but not ultimately, are they not?

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: ” “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just so.

original: ji ltar 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as attainment and clear realization exist as worldly conventions,

original: 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi /
analyzed: 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi /
translated: in the same way, the five kinds of beings are also distinct as worldly conventions,

original: don dam par ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ma yin no //
translated: but not ultimately.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: don dam par ni las @518b kyang med /
analyzed: don dam par ni las @518b kyang med /
translated: ultimately there is no karma,

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med /
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med /
translated: nor is there the ripening of karma,

original: skye ba'ang med /
analyzed: skye ba'ang med /
translated: there is no arising,

original: 'gag pa'ang med /
analyzed: 'gag pa'ang med /
translated: nor is there cessation,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med /
translated: There is no defilement,

original: rnam par byang ba'ang med do //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'ang med do //
translated: and there is no purification.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur ram /
translated: do you think that an unarisen phenomenon arises,

original: 'on tam skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur /🔽rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: 'on tam skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: or do you think that an arisen phenomenon arises?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāriputra,🔽I do not think that an unarisen phenomenon arises,

original: skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do ////
analyzed: skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do ////
translated: and I do not think that an arisen phenomenon arises.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyi shu drug pa /
analyzed: bam po nyi shu drug pa /
translated: Twenty-Sixth Section

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar mi 'dod pa gang yin /🔽rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar mi 'dod pa gang yin / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: what is it that you do not think arises, an unarisen phenomenon or an arisen phenomenon?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not think that form, which is unarisen and empty of essence, arises.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bdag ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness that is not arisen is essentially empty and arises.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu; bdag ni skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu; bdag ni skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, I do not assert that the sense fields, elements, dependent originations, perfections, all the emptinesses, and the factors of awakening

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa @519a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa @519a *//
translated: and the noble truths, and the meditative stabilizations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations,

original: rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
analyzed: rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
translated: the six clairvoyances,🔽the ten powers of a tathāgata,🔽the four fearlessnesses,🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //🔽smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do // smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, I do not assert that the knowledge of all aspects, up to the knowledge of all aspects, is produced, is not produced, both is and is not produced, or neither is produced nor is not produced.

original: chos skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod pa gang /
analyzed: chos skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod pa gang /
translated: Śāriputra then said, “Venerable Subhūti, what is it not to assert that a produced dharma is produced?”🔽Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāriputra, I do not assert that a produced dharma is produced, is not produced, both is and is not produced, or neither is produced nor is not produced.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: He replied, “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that form that arises is essentially empty and arises.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: bdag ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness that arise are essentially empty and arise.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
analyzed: bdag ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
translated: I do not assert that the sense spheres, elements, dependent origination, perfections, all the emptinesses, factors of awakening, noble truths, concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs @519b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs @519b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
translated: the wishlessness gate of liberation, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: and the distinct attributes of a buddha are produced, I do not assert that they are produced, being empty of a basic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu; bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu; bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra, I do not assert that up to the knowledge of all aspects is produced, being empty of a basic nature.”🔽“Venerable Subhūti, what is the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: skye ba skye 'am /
analyzed: skye ba skye 'am /
translated: do you think that arising arises,

original: 'on tam skye ba mi skye /
analyzed: 'on tam skye ba mi skye /
translated: or that non-arising arises?”

original: smras pa; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: smras pa; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: skye ba'ang mi skye /
analyzed: skye ba'ang mi skye /
translated: arising does not arise,

original: mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o //
translated: and non-arising does not arise.”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: 'di ltar / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: those two dharmas, arising and non-arising, are neither conjoined nor disjoined,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: and they are not manifest.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: They are formless, unmanifest, and unobstructing, and they are of a single mark—that is, they are without marks.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: de ltar rnam grangs des na /
translated: in that way, by this one of many explanations,

original: skye ba'ang mi skye /
analyzed: skye ba'ang mi skye /
translated: arising does not arise,

original: mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o //🔽sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: mi skye ba'ang mi skye'o // sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
translated: and non-arising does not arise.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /🔽ma skyes pa'i chos /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / ma skyes pa'i chos /
translated: Śāradvatīputra said, “Venerable Subhūti,🔽unarisen dharmas

original: ma skyes pa'i chos zhes @520a *//
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos zhes @520a *//
translated: are unarisen dharmas.

original: bya bar brjod par khyod kyis spobs na /
analyzed: bya bar brjod par khyod kyis spobs na /
translated: If you are confident in speaking about activity,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa la'ang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa la'ang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ram /
translated: are you confident in speaking about the non-arising of non-arisen phenomena?”

original: rab 'byor / gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos /
translated: non-arisen phenomena

original: ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs so zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs so zhes zer ba ni /
translated: are called ‘non-arisen phenomena.’ If you say that you are confident in speaking about them,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: ma skyes pa'i chos /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos /
translated: non-arisen phenomena

original: ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod pa la bdag gis spobs pa med do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod pa la bdag gis spobs pa med do //
translated: are called ‘non-arisen phenomena.’ I am not confident in speaking about them.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang bdag gis brjod par spobs pa med de /
analyzed: chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang bdag gis brjod par spobs pa med de /
translated: I am not confident in speaking about the non-arising of non-arisen phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: In this way, all these phenomena that are non-arisen, that are non-production, that are eloquence, that are expression, and that are non-arising are neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: They are formless, invisible, and non-reactive.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go /
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go /
translated: They are all of one single mark, which is no mark.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāriputra then said, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: brjod pa ni skye ba med ces bya ba yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa ni skye ba med ces bya ba yin te /
translated: ‘expression’ is said to be ‘non-arising.’

original: spobs pa'ang skye ba med la chos kyang skye ba med de /
analyzed: spobs pa'ang skye ba med la chos kyang skye ba med de /
translated: Eloquence is also non-arising, and phenomena are also non-arising.

original: gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam /
analyzed: gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam /
translated: Are those phenomena that are the basis of expression and eloquence also non-arising?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so.

original: brjod pa ni ma skyes @520b pa'o; ;spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni ma skyes @520b pa'o; ;spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o //
translated: Eloquence is unborn.

original: chos ni ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni ma skyes pa'o //
translated: Dharma is unborn.

original: gang las brtsams te smra bar spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gang las brtsams te smra bar spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang ma skyes pa'o //
translated: The dharmas that one is eloquent about, having begun to speak, are also unborn.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med do //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med do //
translated: it is because form is non-arisen.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med do //
translated: Feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are non-arisen.

original: mig skye ba med do //
analyzed: mig skye ba med do //
translated: The eyes are non-arisen.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid skye ba med do //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid skye ba med do //
translated: The ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind are non-arisen.

original: gzugs skye ba med do //
analyzed: gzugs skye ba med do //
translated: Form is non-arisen.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos skye ba med do //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos skye ba med do //
translated: Sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects are non-arisen.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba med do //
translated: The eye consciousness is non-arisen.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang; lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang; lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba med do //
translated: the nose consciousness, the tongue consciousness, the body consciousness, and the mind consciousness are non-arising.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do //
translated: Eye contact is non-arising.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do //
translated: Ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, and mind contact are non-arising.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is non-arising.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, and feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact are non-arising.

original: sa'i khams skye ba med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams skye ba med do //
translated: the earth element is non-arising,

original: chu'i khams skye ba med do //🔽me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par @521a *//
analyzed: chu'i khams skye ba med do // me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par @521a *//
translated: the water element is non-arising,

original: shes pa'i khams skye ba med do //
analyzed: shes pa'i khams skye ba med do //
translated: the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element are non-arising.

original: ma rig pa skye ba med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa skye ba med do //
translated: Ignorance is non-arising,

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi skye ba med do //
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi skye ba med do //
translated: and volitional actions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and old age and death are non-arising.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do //
translated: The perfection of generosity is non-arising,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do //
translated: and the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are non-arising.

original: nang stong pa nyid skye ba med do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid skye ba med do //
translated: Inner emptiness is non-arising,

original: phyi stong pa nyid skye ba med do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid skye ba med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid skye ba med do // phyi nang stong pa nyid skye ba med do //
translated: External emptiness is non-arising.🔽Internal and external emptiness is non-arising.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is non-arising.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams skye ba med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams skye ba med do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are non-arising.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye pa med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye pa med do //
translated: The right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and eightfold noble path are non-arising.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The noble truths, dhyānas, immeasurables, formless absorptions, liberations, and serial absorptions, and the emptiness,

original: mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge @521b 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge @521b 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med do // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / rnam grangs des na /
translated: the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of supernormal  ability, the faculties, the powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path,🔽the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-arising.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽for this reason🔽

original: brjod pa ni skye ba med pa ste /🔽spobs pa'ang skye ba med la chos kyang skye ba med de /🔽gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o //🔽smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni /🔽chos smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bya bar 'os pa ste /🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
analyzed: brjod pa ni skye ba med pa ste /🔽spobs pa'ang skye ba med la chos kyang skye ba med de /🔽gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o //🔽smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni /🔽chos smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bya bar 'os pa ste /🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
translated: the emptiness of nonapprehension, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonapprehension, the
